title: When your the support and your adc feels down.
body:
Sometimes you just gotta force them to smile.

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/d9a1d3c7d01adbeac7903b3ea0415bc75355018a0f20c43261d66eb38019d8b1.gif

replies.body:
If only it was that simple for the support to cheer the ADC up.
You need to do way more than just forcing them to smile.
http://45.media.tumblr.com/6bfea7e610840811ad93af62e6dda0da/tumblr_o4tjer1AIg1uhyvado1_540.gif

Why can't I remember what this is from?

Can someone please tell me?
Thanks.  No wonder, it's been a while since I watched that.
Is that le world of tanks?
I played it for some time on my X360. Then lost interest when I went to the new gen console.
It's on the computer.  It's crap now though.  All of the RU tanks are op af.

Last time I played, around two years ago, I didn't find the Russian tanks OP.

In terms of the HTs, they just had high alpha and reasonable pen, which meant that any bad player could do decently in it.
The MTs were kinda meh until you got the Obj. 416 or you got to Tier 9/10, where they become quite OP. For bad players, the Tier 9/10 MTs had slightly bouncy armour, which helps. LTs were only average, with the Franch and American LTs being much better. I don't really know about the TDs and SPGs, since I never really played them.
The German TDs were pretty good. The Waffen Traktor was so OP they took it out.
Oh, they did? They were around until I left, lol.
I remember the RU tank a year ago. Man, I loved the BT-7

it's not any good anymore
the new light tanks are all american
It's the chaffee line now

lets check the top lane cam
